The era of big land wars is ending. Any senior official recommending a large-scale deployment of U.S. ground troops to Asia, the Middle East or Africa

‎"The era of big land wars is ending. Any senior official recommending a large-scale deployment of U.S. ground troops to Asia, the Middle East or Africa 'should have his head examined,' to quote Gen. Douglas MacArthur. Instead, get ready for a new epoch of air & sea wars."
